definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: The breath goes now, and some say no;
sentences.chinese: 嘆其氣絕魂離，亦有說不然。

sentences.english: How want to get she bears of that carve is also the Han son dent Jie to draw final expiration of does that engrave?

sentences.english: Quality embodies dignity, An outstanding quality will not embrace any sort of mediocrity .
sentences.chinese: 品質體現尊嚴，出類拔萃的品質氣絕平庸。

sentences.english: By the age of 40, some people are already experiencing breathlessness.
sentences.chinese: 到40歲時，有些人已經感到氣絕。
